TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the store object type to apply the schema filter to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes enumeration is used with the <xref:System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterEntry> class to allow or exclude particular database objects during generation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes All = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Apply the filter to all object types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes Function = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Apply this filter to function object types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Initial value. This is not a valid value to apply.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes Table = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Apply the filter to table object types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Entity.Design.EntityStoreSchemaFilterObjectTypes View = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Apply the filter to view object types.
